name: Gumloop
headline: A no-code platform for automating workflows with AI
description:
Gumloop is a platform for automating repetitive and complex workflows end-to-end with AI. 

Builders drag, drop, and connect modular components onto a canvas to build powerful automations.

We provide the tools and the infrastructure to operate at 10x the speed of writing, testing, and productionizing code so you can focus on the problem at hand.

founders.name: Rahul Behal, Founder
founders.description:
I have a couple of years of industry experience in software engineering including time at Amazon and as a Machine Learning Engineer. I also worked as an Investment Banker for a little while.

I love solving incredibly hard challenges at scale while learning cutting edge technologies and tools. Building AgentHub -- a next generation platform for building AI powered pipelines to automate business workflows.

Write to Google Sheets
Press enter or space to select a node.You can then use the arrow keys to move the node around. Press delete to remove it and escape to cancel. 
Press enter or space to select an edge. You can then press delete to remove it or escape to cancel.

## No need to bother the engineering team
### Build and launch your own AI tools.
![Workflow background](https://www.gumloop.com/images/landing_page/feature_cards/draw.png)
# Build complex workflows visually
If you can describe your workflow as a list of steps, you can automate it.
# No API keys needed to get started
Use OpenAI or Anthropic models instantly — no configuration needed.
![Key icon](https://www.gumloop.com/images/landing_page/feature_cards/api.png)
# Ready made components for advanced AI tasks
Easily access powerful AI tools for tasks like data extraction, scoring and more.
![AI icon](https://www.gumloop.com/images/landing_page/feature_cards/ai.png)
# Create your own custom nodes
Design and deploy your own automation building blocks with the help of AI.
![AI icon](https://www.gumloop.com/images/landing_page/feature_cards/custom.png)
# Automate work fully hands free
Trigger your flows via incoming email, new slack message, via Webhook, and much more.
![Trigger icon](https://www.gumloop.com/images/landing_page/feature_cards/trigger.png)
![Workflow background](https://www.gumloop.com/images/landing_page/feature_cards/scale.png)
# Run at massive scale
Run millions of nodes without restriction. Parallel flow execution allows for 10x the speed of competitors.
## Leverage our community's effortswith pre-built workflows
Featured Templates

## Enterprise-ready
### Secure and Scalable by Default.
### SOC 2 Type 2 & GDPR
We're SOC 2 Type 2 and GDPR compliant. Security is our top priority. Learn more about our policies at [trust.gumloop.com](https://www.gumloop.com/<http:/trust.gumloop.com>)
![SOC 2 Type 2 & GDPR](https://www.gumloop.com/images/compliance_images.svg)
### 0 Training on Your Data
Your data remains untouched for AI training, backed by comprehensive data processing agreements
![0 Training on Your Data](https://www.gumloop.com/images/data_confidentiality.svg)
### SOTA Encryption
Information safeguarded with state-of-the-art encryption, both at rest and during transmission
![SOTA Encryption](https://www.gumloop.com/images/sota_encryption.svg)
### Access Control
Implement precise user permissions and role-based access for authorized users only
![Access Control](https://www.gumloop.com/images/fine_grained_access_control.svg)
### Auto-scaling Compute
System automatically adjusts compute resources based on demand for optimal performance
![Auto-scaling Compute](https://www.gumloop.com/images/auto_scaling_compute.svg)
### Reserved Compute
Enterprise customers can reserve compute resources for consistent performance
![Reserved Compute](https://www.gumloop.com/images/reserved_compute.svg)
### Parallelized Execution
Workflows automatically execute steps in parallel to reduce processing time and improve efficiency
![Parallelized Execution](https://www.gumloop.com/images/parallelized_execution.svg)
### Usage Metrics
Track usage metrics and monitor system performance to optimize workflows and resource allocation
![Usage Metrics](https://www.gumloop.com/images/usage_tracking.svg)
[Learn more about our policies](https://www.gumloop.com/<https:/trust.gumloop.com/>)
## The platform gets better daily
### Ask us and a competitor for the same feature.See who ships it first.
### December 2024
Gumloop Interfaces
Multi Auth Support
Gumloop SDK
Perplexity Search
AI Flow Building
Video Analysis Support
Facebook Ad Scraper
Jira Integration
### November 2024
Flow Failure Alerts
Revamped Run Report UI
Join Path Node
Credit Overages
Gummie Feedback System
Azure Multi-Model Support
Google Drive Folder Trigger
Revamped All Documentation
### October 2024
Node Library Upgrade
Custom Nodes
Claude 3.5 (new) support
Media Support on X and LinkedIn
ClickUp Nodes
Monday.com Nodes
Large Flow Optimizations
UX Improvements
### September 2024
New Chrome Extension
Copy Paste
Snap to Grid
Supabase Nodes
Outlook Nodes
Notion Triggers
SERP API
New Notes
### August 2024
New Permissions System
Extract to Table
Discord Nodes
Google Drive Nodes
Platform Improvements
Advocates Program
Experts Program
SOC2 Security & Compliance
### July 2024
GPT-4o Mini Support
Massive UI Updates
Multi Condition If Statements
Combine Text Variables

## No need to bother the engineering team
### Build and launch your own AI tools.
![Workflow background⟨72⟩]
# Build complex workflows visually
If you can describe your workflow as a list of steps, you can automate it.
# No API keys needed to get started
Use OpenAI or Anthropic models instantly — no configuration needed.
![Key icon⟨73⟩]
# Ready made components for advanced AI tasks
Easily access powerful AI tools for tasks like data extraction, scoring and more.
![AI icon⟨74⟩]
# Create your own custom nodes
Design and deploy your own automation building blocks with the help of AI.
![AI icon⟨75⟩]
# Automate work fully hands free
Trigger your flows via incoming email, new slack message, via Webhook, and much more.
![Trigger icon⟨76⟩]
![Workflow background⟨77⟩]
# Run at massive scale
Run millions of nodes without restriction. Parallel flow execution allows for 10x the speed of competitors.

## Enterprise-ready
### Secure and Scalable by Default.
### SOC 2 Type 2 & GDPR
We're SOC 2 Type 2 and GDPR compliant. Security is our top priority. Learn more about our policies at trust.gumloop.com⟨81⟩
![SOC 2 Type 2 & GDPR⟨82⟩]
### 0 Training on Your Data
Your data remains untouched for AI training, backed by comprehensive data processing agreements
![0 Training on Your Data⟨83⟩]
### SOTA Encryption
Information safeguarded with state-of-the-art encryption, both at rest and during transmission
![SOTA Encryption⟨84⟩]
### Access Control
Implement precise user permissions and role-based access for authorized users only
![Access Control⟨85⟩]
### Auto-scaling Compute
System automatically adjusts compute resources based on demand for optimal performance
![Auto-scaling Compute⟨86⟩]
### Reserved Compute
Enterprise customers can reserve compute resources for consistent performance
![Reserved Compute⟨87⟩]
### Parallelized Execution
Workflows automatically execute steps in parallel to reduce processing time and improve efficiency
![Parallelized Execution⟨88⟩]
### Usage Metrics
Track usage metrics and monitor system performance to optimize workflows and resource allocation
![Usage Metrics⟨89⟩]
Learn more about our policies⟨17⟩

generated_description:
**Gumloop: Simplifying AI-Driven Workflow Automation**

Founded in 2023 and backed by Y Combinator's W24 batch, Gumloop is on a mission to democratize workflow automation with its no-code platform. By allowing users to drag, drop, and configure modular components on an intuitive canvas, Gumloop empowers both technical and non-technical users to automate complex processes without writing a single line of code.

### Key Features

- **Intuitive Design**: Easy-to-use interface where users can visually map out workflows.
- **Rapid Deployment**: Operate at 10x speed compared to traditional coding—perfect for those who want to focus on solving problems instead of getting bogged down in development.
- **AI-Enhanced Automation**: Leverage powerful AI capabilities for tasks like web scraping, document processing, and SEO automation, all without needing extensive technical know-how.

### Recent Highlights

Gumloop recently secured a **$17 million Series A** funding round, which will help ramp up its development and further refine its offerings. With its enterprise-ready features—like SOC 2 Type 2 compliance and state-of-the-art encryption—it's clear that Gumloop prioritizes security and scalability as integral parts of its platform.

### Growing Community and Use Cases

The platform is built on a foundation of community feedback, and users are already seeing significant productivity boosts. One user reported a **65% increase in meetings year-over-year**, showcasing the tangible impact of Gumloop on everyday business operations.

Gumloop integrates seamlessly with major platforms (think Google, Slack, GitHub) and encourages collaboration by allowing teams to build workflows together. Plus, there’s no need to bother engineering teams for support when users can create and launch their own tools right from the platform.

### Start Your Automation Journey

If you find yourself overwhelmed with repetitive tasks and need a way to streamline your workflow, Gumloop is here to help. You can start for free and experience firsthand how simple it can be to automate your workflows with AI. 

For more information, check out their official website: [Gumloop](https://www.gumloop.com/).

In summary, Gumloop is not just another automation tool. It's a game-changing platform aimed at making AI-driven workflow automation accessible to everyone, no matter their background. If your processes are cluttered and you want to reclaim your time, give Gumloop a try.
